{{{
<portlet:defineObjects />
<div id="<portlet:namespace />">

</div>
<script language="javascript>
  jQuery.addPortlet(new testing.TestingPortlet("<portlet:namespace />"));
</script>

== Create testing-portlet.js  ==

{{{
(function($, w){
        // Create "testing" namespace if not created
        if(!w.testing) {
                w.testing = {};
        }
        
        w.testing.TestingPortlet = function(nameSpace, options) {

                var mThis = $.Portlet.call(this, nameSpace); // Extend parent functionality
                
                mThis.query().append("<h1>Inserting text at end of portlet</h1>");
                
                mThis.ready = function() {
                // this is called when $(document).ready is called.
                };
                
                return mThis;
        };
})(jQuery, window);
}}}
